author: TV Guide
title: Justin Bieber's Lawyers Want Everyone to Stop Posting His Nude Vacation Pics
text: Justin Bieber's Lawyers Want Everyone to Stop Posting His Nude Vacation Pics It was the pic seen 'round the world.Justin Bieber's lawyers are hoping to stop news sites from posting naked pics of him on vacay in Bora Bora, according to ... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 7:56 AM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 7:56 AM It was the pic seen 'round the world. Justin Bieber 's lawyers are hoping to stop news sites from posting naked pics of him on vacay in Bora Bora, according to The Hollywood Reporter . A legal team repping the Biebs sent a cease and desist letter to the New York Daily News, which was the first outlet to post the photos. "We recently became informed that your company has obtained and is distributing unauthorized photographs of our Client including images showing him without clothing," the letter reads, therefore confirming the photos are, in fact, of Bieber, and had not been Photoshopped to look like him, as some had suggested. Your guide to American Horror Story: Hotel On Wednesday, the Daily News posted a gallery with a whopping 95 images of Bieber in various states of undress on a hotel balcony. Beauty blogger Jayde Pierce, his alleged girlfriend, is also in some of the photos. The letter asked the photos to be taken down within 12 hours. They are still live as of right now, so do yourself a favor and by no means go look at them. WATCH: Bieber shows off his new belly tattoo By TV Guide   TV Guide
